message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500 to meet you halfway.  This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. What do you say?
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I still believe $10,000 is the maximum I can pay for the product. I hope we can reach a fair agreement.
